parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: A callback function that is invoked when the observed element's size changes.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: A React ref object pointing to the target element to observe. If not provided, the document's root element is observed.

parameters.name: depsArray
parameters.description: An array of dependencies that will trigger the effect when changed.

properties.name: contentRect
properties.description: A read-only rectangle describing the size of the observed element.
